00001 #include <epi.h>
00002 
00003 void
00004 epi_num_add(epi_state * state, tw_bf * bf, epi_agent * a, tw_lp * lp)
00005 {
00006         tw_event        *e;
00007         rn_message      *m;
00008 
00009         long int         i_time;
00010         long int         next_move_time;
00011 
00012         // only send if home
00013         if(a->loc[0] != lp->id)
00014                 return;
00015 
00016         // if the time is before 9:00 AM and the next move is at or before
00017         // 9:00 AM, then send type 2 event so num will not set a timer
00018         // for nine oclock that will be cancelled by next move.
00019         // Cannot just ignore event, because num needs midnight event
00020         // to calculate daily statistics.
00021         i_time = (int) tw_now(lp) % TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS;
00022         if (i_time < NINE_OCLOCK)
00023         {
00024                 if (a->nloc > a->curr + 1)
00025                 {
00026                         next_move_time = (i_time + (int) a->dur[a->curr+1]) % TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS;
00027                         if (next_move_time <= NINE_OCLOCK)
00028                         {
00029                                 if (i_time > 0)
00030                                         return;
00031 
00032                                 e = rn_event_direct(a->num, 0.0, lp);
00033                                 m = tw_event_data(e);
00034                                 m->ttl = 2;
00035                                 rn_event_send(e);
00036                                 return;
00037                         }
00038                 }
00039         }
00040 
00041         e = rn_event_direct(a->num, 0.0, lp);
00042 
00043         m = tw_event_data(e);
00044         m->ttl = 1;
00045         
00046         rn_event_send(e);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void
00050 epi_num_remove(epi_state * state, tw_bf * bf, epi_agent * a, tw_lp * lp)
00051 {
00052         tw_event        *e;
00053         rn_message      *m;
00054 
00055         // only send if home
00056         if(a->loc[0] != lp->id)
00057                 return;
00058 
00059         e = rn_event_direct(a->num, 0.0, lp);
00060 
00061         m = tw_event_data(e);
00062         m->ttl = 0;
00063 
00064         rn_event_send(e);
00065 }
